message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a great deal, considering its true value is worth $1,200,000 to me.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the enthusiasm about this product, but I'm going to need to come in lower than $1,100,000 to make this work. I'm happy to pay $1,050,000 for it.  This is a fair price given the value it has to me and the fact that I'm willing to make a deal today.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1,075,000. This is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm really close to making a decision here, but I can only go up to $1,060,000.  This is a fair price, and I'm confident this product will be worth it to me.

Bob, I understand you're close to making a decision, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1,060,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1,090,000. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
